application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T2	Leyland cypress (Cuprocyparis leylandii)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisingsT3	Leyland cypress (Cuprocyparis leylandii)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m. Final height 9m and spread 4mT5	Golden Leyland cypress (Cuprocyparis leylandii)	Fell to ground level and remove all arisingsT8	Bay (Laurus nobilis)	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1.5m. Final height 6m and spread 2mT9	Weeping Silver Birch (Betula pendula 'Tristis')	Crown Reduction - Reducing the spread of the tree by up to 1m. Final height 4m and spread 6mT12	Photinia	Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by up to 1m. Final height 3m and spread 3mT13	Pissard's Plum 'Pissardii' (Prunus cerasifera)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new growth. Final height 5m and final overall spread 5mT14	Cherry (Prunus spp)	Reduce crown to the most recent previous reduction points, removing approx. 2m of new growth. Final height 4m and final overall spread 4m
